resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

This app was created to help people with memorizing the 99 beautiful names of Allah. I\'m no scholar. All the transcriptions, explanations, translations and soundfiles were gathered from the sources below and I don\'t take any credit for them. I\'ve only gathered them and wrapped them into an app, to make it more convenient. I\'ve put english and turkish transcriptions into the app, because for people who don\'t know how to read arabic yet, it can be helpful to have two different sources. Sadly I couldn\'t find detailed explanations in english like I did in turkish. I may add them later on.\n\nHere are all the sources I used:
